name: frigidly

frigidly adverb
(UNFRIENDLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is unfriendly or very formal: Sarah shook his hand frigidly. The film was frigidly received.
More examplesFewer examplesWilson's frigidly minimal treatment of Puccini's "Madama Butterfly" received its third revival in six years. She smiled frigidly and pretended to concentrate on her dinner.The portrait is of a frigidly elegant Coco Chanel.
